traits.name: Relentless Endurance (1/Long Rest)
traits.desc: When Breex is reduced to 0 hit points, but not killed outright, he can drop to 1 hit point instead.

traits.name: Savage Attack
traits.desc: When Breex scores a critical hit with a melee weapon attack, he can roll one of the weapon's damage dice one additional time and add it to the extra damage of the critical hit.

traits.name: Spellcasting
traits.desc: Breex is a 5th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). Breex knows the following sorcerer spells: * Cantrips (at will): chill touch, firebolt, message, minor image, shocking grasp * 1st level (4 slots): expeditious retreat, feather fall, sleep * 2nd level (3 slots): blur, misty step * 3rd level (2 slots): haste

actions.name: Greatsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Parry
actions.desc: Breex adds 2 to his AC against one melee attack that would hit him. To do so, Breex must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.
